name: The RED Vial
description:
You saw the potential, the power that the RED Vial had, and not for good. And as all hope was lost, before the worst, you heard a loud thump...

After being forced into an inhumane experiment, you must escape, evade being seen by the robots, and save all the other subjects. Lest you all get exposed and-

All the art assets were made by me, some of the audio was made in Sfxr, and the rest by:

  • Sirkoto51
  • Caitlin_100
  • blouhond
  • Natty23
  • V-ktor
  • freedomfightervictor
  • Neotone
  • NeoSpica

Color palette: Mist GB

Made for the N8Jam (With Wannibe Manisha). Theme: Break the system.
